description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the remote code execution vulnerability in the Microsoft ODBC driver (CVE-2024-21451):

1. Apply the relevant security updates for your specific Windows version by downloading them from the Microsoft Update Catalog.
   - For Windows Server 2016: KB5035855
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 for x64-based systems: KB5035845
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 for x64-based systems: KB5035853
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the updates take effect.

**Details**:
- This vulnerability allows unauthorized remote code execution if an attacker convinces a user to connect to a malicious SQL database.
- The updates are critical for closing security gaps and ensuring the integrity of your systems.
- Ensure that the system is fully backed up before applying updates. 

For manual installation, updates can be found here:
- [KB5035845](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035845)
- [KB5035858](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035858)
- [KB5035853](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035853)
- [KB5035854](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5035854).
